Men still hold most positions of power in this country.
Our trip is still very much up in the air.
words.defineEn: (of a drink) not having bubbles in it
words.defineVi: (của một thức uống) không có bong bóng trong đó

examples: Our waitress poured water for everyone at the table.
Water will always find its own level.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
Police turned water cannon on the rioters.
The water boiled away.
words.defineEn: a liquid with no smell, taste, or color, that falls from the sky as rain, and we use for washing, cooking, drinking, etc.
words.defineVi: một chất lỏng không mùi, không vị, không màu, từ trên trời rơi xuống dưới dạng mưa, và chúng ta dùng để giặt giũ, nấu ăn, uống, v.v.

examples: The subway map helped me navigate the different lines.
I like reading a book during my subway ride.
I prefer taking the subway instead of driving in the city.
There are designated seats for elderly and pregnant passengers on the subway.
In 2012, each Subway franchise generated an average of $482,000 a year.
words.defineEn: an underground railway system, typically in a big city
words.defineVi: một hệ thống đường sắt ngầm, thường ở một thành phố lớn

examples: Your car is waiting, sir.
C'm on the crowd is waiting.
We waited there for the better part of an hour.
What are you waiting for?
Leeds United had waited for success for eighteen years.
words.defineEn: to not leave until a person or thing is ready or present or something happens
words.defineVi: để không rời đi cho đến khi một người hoặc điều đã sẵn sàng hoặc hiện tại hoặc một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: It looks just like a pâté at, like, a fine party.
The dough is called pate choux, and if you fry them, you can make churros.
Rice is mine, pâté is mine, pastry is mine.
The COUNTRY is famous for its bread, PASTRIES, pates and other DELICACIES.
I recently taught Ryan and Shane from Unsolved how to make pate choux.
words.defineEn: a paste made from finely chopped or ground meat, fish, or vegetables, mixed with spices and sometimes alcohol, served cold and often used as an appetize
words.defineVi: một loại bột nhão làm từ thịt, cá hoặc rau thái nhỏ hoặc xay nhỏ, trộn với gia vị và đôi khi là rượu, được dùng lạnh và thường được sử dụng như một món khai vị
